content:
sehz opened issue #7218:

Is this https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wit-bindgen/pull/678 going to be in the 14 release? We need this feature.

thanks

pchickey commented on issue #7218:

wit-bindgen is only used to build tests & the component adapter in the Wasmtime workspace, it is not part of the release. That PR can be used by your client code without needing it to be part of a Wasmtime release.

pchickey closed issue #7218:

Is this https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wit-bindgen/pull/678 going to be in the 14 release? We need this feature.

thanks
